paragraphs.content: Praise ye the LORD. Praise the LORD, O my soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Praise ye the Lord. Praise the Lord, O my soul.

paragraphs.content: While I live will I praise the LORD: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
paragraphs.contentHtml: While I live will I praise the Lord: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.

paragraphs.content: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.

paragraphs.content: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.
paragraphs.contentHtml: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.

paragraphs.content: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the Lord his God:

paragraphs.content: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:

paragraphs.content: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The LORD looseth the prisoners:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The Lord looseth the prisoners:

paragraphs.content: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind: the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down: the LORD loveth the righteous:
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord openeth the eyes of the blind: the Lord raiseth them that are bowed down: the Lord loveth the righteous:

paragraphs.content: The LORD preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.

paragraphs.content: The LORD shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the Lord.
